title.en: Webhook triggered with event for each item in JSON array

titleFormatted.en: Webhook triggered with [[event]] for each item in JSON array

hint.en:
Add the query parameter `event` to the webhook url to specify the exact target of the webhook.

Will try to parse the HTTP body as a JSON array, and trigger for each item item in the array.

Ex: ["a", "b", "c"] will result in three triggered events with the item tag set to a, b, c.
